body:
Example and instructions about how to use this option when having issues with external (to spack) compilers.

See [Here](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!msg/spack/lbD0kUJDM0A/Sktn7l2-BwAJ) for more context. After that, @citibeth asked if I could do a PR and add this to the docs, and there it is.
title: docs: Adds content about the `extra_rpaths` compiler config option
